testResults.name: Bullet List Exit Behavior
testResults.description: Pressing Enter twice should exit bullet lists

testResults.name: Ordered List Exit Behavior
testResults.description: Pressing Enter twice should exit ordered lists

testResults.name: Task List Exit Behavior
testResults.description: Pressing Enter twice should exit task lists

testResults.name: Backspace at List Item Start
testResults.description: Backspace at start of list item should lift item out of list
testResults.expectedBehavior: Lift item out of list or merge with previous

testResults.name: List Nesting with Tab
testResults.description: Tab should indent list items to create nested lists

testResults.name: List Type Switching
testResults.description: Should be able to switch between list types

testResults.name: Mixed Content in Lists
testResults.description: Lists should handle mixed content (text, formatting, etc.)
